subject: Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Brek Shea’s free kick gave the Americans the lead just before halftime, but Jozy Altidore was shown two yellow cards in the 68th minute and was sent off.
snippet: Brek Shea’s free kick gave the Americans the lead just before halftime, but Jozy Altidore was shown two yellow cards in the 68th minute and was sent off.
